message.body: So excited for today!! What is the dress code?

Good morning! Me too, I woke up feeling like it was Christmas haha! Good question...I guess cutesy casual? (Is that a thing??) I'm wearing a little lacy offwhite dress, if that gives you an idea... :-)
It is Christmas morning!!! So exciting!!! I can't wait to see you and your cutesy casual off white lacy dress! And yes cutesy casual is definitely a thin
